LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyBanner.label: rusted army banner
LanguageData.NAT_RustedBeacon_Reinforcements.label: rusted beacon
LanguageData.NAT_RustedBeacon_Reinforcements.descript: A rusted beacon that calls reinforcements if there are enemies nearby. Can be stunned with EMP or disruptors.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedBroadcastDish.label: rusted broadcast dish
LanguageData.NAT_RustedBroadcastDish.description: A large rusted broadcast dish. Transfers signals in Rusted army communication network.
